answerText: Catherine Morland [accept either][10] Catherine Morland appears in this author's novel Northanger Abbey. She also wrote about the Bennet sisters in Pride and Prejudice.
heading: ACF Fall |2008 | Caltech + Langston | 9 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Isabella Thorpe attempts to force this character into marrying her boastful brother John.  [10] Name this character, the protagonist of Northanger Abbey, who is embarrassingly caught sneaking into the abandoned room of General Tilney's dead wife by her future husband Henry Tilney.
